title: Compass & Level
description: It is a application that Compass & Leveler package using sensors on device.Simple and easy to use application.No more asking to other when you locating plant pot direction or hanging a picture frame on a wall.Main Function.  - Various Design : It has various kind of Compass design.  - Indicate Current rocation at Compass Mode.  - Change Origin : Easy to measure relative gradient using Set Origin button at Leveler Mode.  - Hold and Restart : Easy to read using Hold and Restart button at Leveler Mode.Caution.  - The result may differ from real North or Flat depends on device's sensor accuracy.
descriptionHTML:
It is a application that Compass & Leveler package using sensors on device.

Simple and easy to use application.

No more asking to other when you locating plant pot direction or hanging a picture frame on a wall.

Main Function.

- Various Design : It has various kind of Compass design.
- Indicate Current rocation at Compass Mode.
- Change Origin : Easy to measure relative gradient using Set Origin button at Leveler Mode.
- Hold and Restart : Easy to read using Hold and Restart button at Leveler Mode.

Caution.

- The result may differ from real North or Flat depends on device's sensor accuracy.
comments: Good compass. The displayed altitude keeps disappearing. Also needs a function to select between feet or meters for altitude and inHg and mb for pressure.

Great compass, camera permission is for flash Shame on all you noobs who won't give this super awesome compass app a chance. The camera permission is used to toggle the camera flash (if you have one) in night mode. The features in this app are top notch. Camera flash can't be accessed without camera permission.
What's wrong with it?! I wonder why this application (especially the Leveler) has become worse than it was before!
